passive_1: Grants a  spell shield that blocks the next ability. This shield refreshes after no damage is taken from enemy champions for 40 seconds.

motd: Bugfix: Fixed a bug where the spellshield would not be affected by item haste.
Bugfix: Passive cooldown no longer ignores item haste granted from Ingenious Hunter.

passive_1: Grants a  spell shield that blocks the next ability. This shield refreshes after no damage is taken from enemy champions for 40 seconds.

motd: Change: Now block only the first ability that hits, rather than every ability that hits at the same time the shield is broken.

passive_1: Grants a spell shield that blocks the next enemy ability. This shield refreshes after no damage is taken from enemy champions for 40 seconds.

passive_2: Grants +45 health regen per 5 seconds for up to 10 seconds after taking damage from an enemy champion or when the spell shield breaks.

motd: Change: Will now only be ready on cloned units if it was ready on the creating champion.
